summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1217, for the improvement of Second Avenue North, from Ward Street to Prospect Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks and stairways, under Ordinance No. 13340 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
